sn45.29:4.6: The noble eightfold path should be developed to completely understand these three feelings.
sn45.29:4.7: What is the noble eightfold path?
sn45.29:4.9: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.29:4.11: This noble eightfold path should be developed to completely understand these three feelings.”
